page.title: 06VILLAGE LIBRARY,GOBOWEN
page.content: A pre-fabricated building,the {library}in Gobowen is situated opposite the police station on the B5069 Road to St.Martin's. It is open on two afternoons and two evenings per week. As part of the{Shropshire County {Library Service}it provides a valuable service to the community and is efficiently run by Mrs Jinks. There are well stocked sections of books for villagers of all ages. Along with reference books, there are books on travel,history,languages,cookery, sport and children's stories. At near-by Weston Rhyn a{mobile {library van}calls in the village each week.
